name: ACCESS DESIGN
overview: Accessdesires is a boutique singapore creative design studio specializing in graphic, website design and development, visual identity, photography. Our company develops smart, creative and practical B2B and B2C marketing communications including websites design, print collateral, advertising, packaging, corporate identity, logo design. In addition, access desires provides strategies for web hosting, PHP web application development, web marketing(SEO), e-commerce blogs and social media marketing. Our clients include companies in Singapore, Malaysia, China.
